channel.title: Blurr client background help
channel.description: ok well i have a background picture. but for some reason the runescape rocks and sword is on it. and i dont want it on my background. how do i get rid of it?

item.title: Blurr client background help
item.dc:creator: @faded_vision Faded Vision
item.description:
@faded_vision wrote:

well you cant have no background lol, just change it to something else, you can find the picture in the files folder in the client then look in “Spirits”

The picture is called “title”

Make sure you keep the same name when you replace it:P

Read full topic
